Greetings to Prime Minister of Barbados
articles.content:
Greetings to Prime Minister of Barbados
    Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, Premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Prime Minister of Barbados Owen Arthur on the occasion of the 36th anniversary of its independence.
 The message wished him great success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Prime Minister of Ukraine
articles.content:
Greetings to Prime Minister of Ukraine
    Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, Premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Viktor Yanukovich upon his appointment as Prime Minister of Ukraine.
 In the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Ukraine would continue to develop on good terms, the message wished him success in his responsible work.
